title: Short Mystery Story Collection 005
creator: Various
description:
LibriVox recording of Short Mystery Story Collection 005, by Various.

Librivox’s Short Mystery Story Collection 005: a collection of 10 short works of mysterious fiction in the public domain read by a group of LibriVox members.

Read by LibriVox volunteers. For more free audiobooks, or to become a volunteer reader, please visit librivox.org. M4B format available
subject: librivox; mystery; detective; crime; short story; fiction
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
